function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impacts on construction projects due to COVID-19","Impact":"Financial instability, delays, productivity challenges, mental health issues, material distribution issues","Mitigation":"Implementing safety and health protocols, improving financial solvency, managing delays effectively, providing support for mental health, optimizing material distribution","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, project management software, mental health support platforms","People":"Construction workers, project members, companies, suppliers and subcontractors, owners, public agencies","Owner":"Construction companies, developers, public agencies"}]}
